InvoiceLine.name: InvoiceLine
InvoiceLine.description: Represents the amount that a buyer must pay for a product, service, or fee. Invoice lines are created based on the amount of an order line.

AdjustmentAmount.description: Sum of adjustments made to the invoice line.

AdjustmentAmountWithTax.description: Sum of adjustment amounts, including associated taxes related to the invoice line.

AdjustmentTaxAmount.description: Sum of tax adjustments to the invoice line.

Balance.description: The outstanding balance for an invoice line. This is equal to the invoice’s total amount with tax after deducting the payments made.

BillingAddressId.description: Lookup field to an InvoiceAddressGroup containing the billing address for the invoice line. Assign one InvoiceAddressGroup to the invoiceLine's BillingAddressID, and another InvoiceAddressGroup to the invoiceLine's ShippingAddressId.

BillingScheduleGroupId.description: This field is a relationship field.

BillingScheduleId.description: ID of the billing schedule for the invoice line.

ChargeAmount.description: Sum of charges made to the invoice line.

ChargeAmountWithTax.description: Amount on a charge invoice line, including tax.

ChargeTaxAmount.description: Tax to be applied on a charge invoice line.

ConvertedNegAmount.description: The amount from an invoice line that is converted to credit.

GroupReferenceEntityItemId.description: Grouping field for adjustment line items.

HasMultipleItems.description: Indicates whether this field merges items from the same billing period.

InvoiceId.description: The invoice that contains this invoice line.

InvoiceLineEndDate.description: For invoice lines made from a time-based service, the end date of the billing for the service.

InvoiceLineStartDate.description: For invoice lines made from a time-based service, the first date of the billing for the service.

InvoiceStatus.description: State of the invoice line. Inherited from the invoice’s status.

LegalEntityAccountingPeriodId.description: This field is a relationship field.

LegalEntityId.description: This field is a relationship field.

LineAmount.description: The amount of the invoice line.

NetCreditsApplied.description: The total credit memo line amount applied to the invoice line. This amount is calculated by subtracting the unapplied credit memo line amount from the applied credit memo line amount.

NetPaymentsApplied.description: The total payment applied to the invoice line. This amount is calculated by subtracting the unapplied payment amount from the applied payment amount.

Product2Id.description: The product that was charged or ordered to create the invoice line.

Quantity.description: Number of units of the order product that created the invoice line.

ReferenceEntityItemId.description: The order item or adjustment item that created the invoice line.

ReferenceEntityItemType.description: The type of transaction that created the invoice line.

ReferenceEntityItemTypeCode.description: The type of object that created the invoice line.

RelatedLineId.description: The original invoice line that was adjusted or taxed.

ShippingAddressId.description: The ID of the shipping address associated with the invoice line.

TaxAmount.description: Total tax for the invoice line.

TaxCode.description: The code used to calculate tax rate for the invoice line.

TaxDocumentNumber.description: Represents the latest record in the external tax engine in which this invoice line item is included.

TaxEffectiveDate.description: The date used to calculate the invoice line’s TaxAmount.

TaxName.description: User-defined name for the applied tax.

TaxRate.description: Percentage value used for calculating tax.

TaxTransactionNumber.description: Represents the transaction in the external tax engine in which the taxes for the line were calculated for the invoice line.

TaxTreatmentId.description: The tax treatment used on this invoice line.

Type.description: Shows the type of transaction for the invoice line.

UnitPrice.description: Price for one unit of the item on the invoice line.
